detail_desc: V-neck jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Oversized polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, high-waisted trousers in a sturdy, stretch cotton weave with a zip fly and fake back pockets. Decorative seams and slim legs with slits at the hems.
Top in jersey made from a viscose blend with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a racer back and cut-out section at the back.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and wide elastication at the hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey, one in pointelle. Press-studs down the front and along one leg, short puff sleeves and short legs. Picot trim around the neckline and sleeves.
Multi-strand necklace in metal with chains in various designs and pendants in the shape of a coin and a cross. Adjustable length approx. 41-50 cm.

Parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish, collar, faux fur lapels and a zip down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets, a concealed drawstring at the waist and zip at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
Swim pants and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long sleeves and a frill trim at the shoulders. Pants with an elasticated waist. UPF 50.
Short top in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an overlocked edge at the hem.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with ties at the back and back of the neck and cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support.
Knee-length cargo shorts in washed, stretch twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and zip fly with a press-stud. Side pockets, back pockets and zipped leg pockets.
Trousers in woven fabric with a wide jersey waistband, fake fly and straight, wide legs with creases.
Cap in a cotton weave with a practical flap at the back to protect the ears and back of the neck.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, straight-style dress in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck, long sleeves and high slits in the sides.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere with a roll edge.
Longer, fitted top in stretch cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps.
Suit trousers in twill with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Straight wide legs with creases and extended hems to give the impression of wide turn-ups.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Hat in braided paper straw with a decorative hole pattern. Width of brim 14 cm.

Bomber jacket in a sturdy weave with a ribbed stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Side pockets, a zipped pocket on one sleeve, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at each end. One outer compartment with an imitation suede flap and magnetic fastener. Lined. Size 18x23 cm.
Hair clip in metal with a large fabric bow. Size of bow approx. 15x16 cm.
Soft pile slippers with embroidery on the front, elastication around the tops, terry inside and soft, imitation suede soles.
Playsuit in a crêpe weave with an opening at the front and short flounced sleeves. V-neck at the back with a flounce at the top and a concealed zip. Seam at the waist and wide legs.
Long down jacket in woven fabric with a large collar, concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved dress, pair of trousers and a hairband in soft, organic cotton jersey. Dress with press-studs on the shoulders. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elastication around the heels. Hairband with a large bow at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey.
Platform sandals with suede straps and cork soles. Adjustable ankle strap with a buckle. Leather linings and insoles. Platform front 4 cm. Heel 8 cm.

Thigh boots in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester with rounded toes and covered block heels. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 8 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with 3/4-length puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Headband in soft faux shearling made partly from recycled polyester.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length, 43-50 cm.
Fine-knit cotton jumper with a V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Diameter 1.1 cm to 4 cm.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, open chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Relaxed-fit slipover in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a deep V-neck and straight hem with angled slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a lined hood, cable-knit front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Sleeveless dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a boat neck.
Trainers in leather with suede and mesh details. Padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and chunky soles that are patterned underneath.
Wide waist belt in velvet-covered imitation leather with a grained finish and round metal buckle. Width 6 cm.
Padded, sleeveless fancy dress costume in jersey.
Long-sleeved dress in burnout-patterned jersey with a round neck, visible seams front and back and an asymmetric, raw-edge hem. Unlined.
Fine-knit hat in soft yarn with a roll edge.
Running cap in woven fabric with a soft terry sweatband inside and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with a fringed hem.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit with a jacquard pattern. Long raglan sleeves, buttons at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Round-necked T-shirt in a soft cotton blend. The T-shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Baby Exclusive. V-neck slipover in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Wedge-heeled espadrilles with covered toes and open heels. Adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and a braided jute trim around the soles and heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel approx. 8 cm.
Shirt in a woven fabric with a matching tie or bow tie. Turn-down collar, chest pocket and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Adjustable tie/bow tie with a plastic fastener.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Sweatpants in a regular fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, welt side pockets and a welt back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Cargo jacket in sturdy cotton twill with a collar, classic front and patch front pockets with a flap. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a wide detachable tie belt and a double back vent. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft velour made from a cotton blend with a seam at the waist and wide flounce at the hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, high collar at the front and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Thermal fleece inside.
Short-sleeved top in a rib knit with a ribbed trim around the neckline. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
A-line blouse in an airy, patterned cotton weave with elastication around the top and short, flounced, raglan sleeves.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
